page.title: 18THE BOGGS HOLDINGS
page.content: holder and there are still Mr Thomson,Mr Peden,Mr Bolton and Mr Somerville who moved in in the early days.They must notice a fantastic change in the types of farming and the marvellous new machinery now available.My mum Mrs Cuthill talks of spending hours every night hoeing strawberries for 2d,less than 1p per hour.She hated it.The community spirit has almost gone and we are fast becoming a commuter area.The new Tranent by_pass will finish 1 and a half miles North of the Boggs providing a direct link to Edinburgh by_passing Wallyford and Musselburgh as well.Today four holders make thier living totally from thier property. The youngest small holder is 45.Grain covers more acres than anything else.
